olak: The Hrax don't consume food and liquids through the same hole that they talk through. Any further research about this has been blocked, mostly out of privacy for the Hrax.
kuk,kuk:
The Hrax aren't known to use this to greet eachother, and have mostly only used this with humans.
Any similarities between this word and the German word "Kuckuck" ("peekaboo", lit. "cuckoo") are purely accidental, surely.
lew: When a verb ends with "<hrax> lew</hrax>", that verb is currently happening, in the present. When "<hrax> lew</hrax>" comes after a noun it becomes a verb and is in the present.
